dcterms:description: MIMIC-III common is a publicly accessible dataset containing discharge summary documents from an Intensive Care Unit (ICU), with each document associated with ICD codes labeled by medical coding experts. The dataset was filtered to retain instances featuring at least one of the top 50 most frequent ICD codes.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III common

dcterms:creator: Alistair E. W. Johnson

Peter Szolovits
Leo Anthony Celi
Roger G. Mark
dcterms:description: MIMIC-III few-shot is a subset of the MIMIC-III dataset, randomly selected to assess the model’s performance under limited training data conditions. It comprises about one-eighth of the instances from the training data, focusing on the top 50 most frequent ICD codes.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III few-shot

dcterms:creator: Alistair E. W. Johnson
Tom J. Pollard
Lu Shen
Li wei H. Lehman

Mohammad Mahdi Ghassemi
Benjamin Moody
Peter Szolovits
Leo Anthony Celi
Roger G. Mark
dcterms:description: MIMIC-III rare is a dataset created to assess the model’s performance on predicting rare disease codes. It includes instances of rare diseases defined by medical experts, with an average of about 5 training instances per label.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III rare

dcterms:creator: Hua Cheng
Rana Jafari
April Russell
Russell Klopfer
Edmond Lu
Benjamin Striner
Matthew Gormley
dcterms:description: MDACE Profee is a dataset used for evaluating the model’s explainability, containing expert-annotated text spans for each ICD code assigned, indicating the rationale behind the assignment. It includes 172 sentence-ICD pairs in the evaluation dataset.
dcterms:title: MDACE Profee
